58#include <openssl/err.h>
59#include <openssl/x509.h>
60
61
62#ifndef OPENSSL_NO_STDIO
63int X509_STORE_set_default_paths(X509_STORE *ctx)
64 {
65 X509_LOOKUP *lookup;
66
67 lookup=X509_STORE_add_lookup(ctx,X509_LOOKUP_file());
68 if (lookup == NULL) return(0);
69 X509_LOOKUP_load_file(lookup,NULL,X509_FILETYPE_DEFAULT);
70
71 lookup=X509_STORE_add_lookup(ctx,X509_LOOKUP_hash_dir());
72 if (lookup == NULL) return(0);
73 X509_LOOKUP_add_dir(lookup,NULL,X509_FILETYPE_DEFAULT);
74
75 /* clear any errors */
76 ERR_clear_error();
77
78 return(1);
79 }
80
81int X509_STORE_load_locations(X509_STORE *ctx, const char *file,
82 const char *path)
83 {
84 X509_LOOKUP *lookup;
85
86 if (file != NULL)
87 {
88 lookup=X509_STORE_add_lookup(ctx,X509_LOOKUP_file());
89 if (lookup == NULL) return(0);
90 if (X509_LOOKUP_load_file(lookup,file,X509_FILETYPE_PEM) != 1)
91 return(0);
92 }
93 if (path != NULL)
94 {
95 lookup=X509_STORE_add_lookup(ctx,X509_LOOKUP_hash_dir());
96 if (lookup == NULL) return(0);
97 if (X509_LOOKUP_add_dir(lookup,path,X509_FILETYPE_PEM) != 1)
98 return(0);
99 }
100 if ((path == NULL) && (file == NULL))
101 return(0);
102 return(1);
103 }
104
105#endif
106
